Identification of Carpus: Section  25(1) of the  Partition  Law  requires the court to examine the title of each  party and  hear
and  receive  evidence  in  support thereof.
column2: It has  been  consistently held that it is  the duty of the
Court to examine and investigate title in a partition action, because the judgement is a judgement
